reviewText: ambitious. aggressive. shocking and edgy. Graphically violence and not for kids absolutely. A statement for it's time and cutting edge on top of edgy. Worth the experience but not at the collector prices I've checked. revolutionary and the graphically violent material in a way fits the image story and atmosphere they were trying to capture. If you are a true fan of anime and manga try to give this a view to for an opinion of your own. necessary.
